buyTicket(uint16).details: Purchase ticket and send reward if necessary

getTicketsPurchased().details: Returns ticket map array for front-end access. Using a getter method is ineffective since it allows only element-level access

statements.documentation:
Placing the "burden" of sendReward() on the last ticket
 buyer is okay, because the refund from destroying the
 arrays decreases net gas cost

documentation.text:
@dev Send lottery winner their reward
 @return address of winner
